description:
**Prerequisites:** [Small](../../Minor-Racial-Talents/Small.md) size, Non-Humanoid
This race can be used as a mount by other creatures, though typically only by Tiny or very small riders. Members of this race are suitable for riding and can carry riders effectively. This talent allows the race to serve as mounts for other creatures, though the rider must have the appropriate skills (Ride and Mounted Combat) to use them effectively.
Creatures with this talent are small-sized and can carry Tiny riders or very small riders comfortably. They are physically capable of supporting the weight and movement of a mounted combatant, though they are best suited for Tiny races or very light riders. This talent is only available to Small-sized creatures and cannot be taken by humanoids.
## Mounted Combat Bonus
As a standard side effect of being a mount, creatures with this talent typically provide combat bonuses to their riders. A mounted warrior has certain advantages over a fighter on foot, and adds a special +1 bonus to his attack total in such a situation. If a mounted combatant charges before the attack, there is a special +2 bonus to the damage roll, in addition to any other bonuses applied. This will only apply on the first round, and is granted by the momentum of the charge.
Some creatures with the Small Mount talent may not provide these combat bonuses (as noted in their individual descriptions).
To ride a creature with this talent effectively, a Hero must have the Ride special skill. Controlling a mount in battle is a highly skilled task, requiring the Mounted Combat special skill.
name: Small Mount
